name: SUITE
description:
Hello! And congratulations on your selection for SUITE, the Secret Underground Intelligence Testing Environment. We know you may have some questions, like "What? Where am I? Who are you?" or "How am I supposed to escape a room without any doors!? You people are crazy! Let me out!" but the fact of the matter is that this was thoroughly covered during the on-boarding process, and I would be wasting my breath repeating it here.  Just remember:

  • Locomote smoothly with the left joystick/trackpad
  • Teleport and turn with the right joystick/trackpad
  • Grip things to hold them and ungrip to let them go

Now put that brain of yours to work and find your way out of here.

We'll be watching.
